1�Enter the battlefield?Enter using 5????.Enter.Decline.
1�How many 5???? will you use?None.One.Two.Three.Four.Five.
1�Enter the battlefield?Enter.Decline.

s.�Which battlefield will you enter?None.Beguiling Radiance.Seductive Radiance.Maddening Radiance.Provenance Watcher.

1�{You have not claimed all of your battle reward
1�Relinquish your claim to the battle spoils?Yes.On second thought...
1�Items will be lost. Are you certain?Yes, relinquish.No, retain.
1�Leave the battlefield?Run away.Stay.
1�Leave the battlefield?Run away.Stay.
1�Leave the battlefield?Run away.Stay.
1�Leave the battlefield?Run away.Stay.
1�Leave the battlefield?Run away.Stay.
1�Leave the battlefield?Run away.Stay.
1�Leave the battlefield?Run away.Stay.
1�Leave the battlefield?Run away.Stay.
1�Leave the battlefield?Run away.Stay.
1�I travel......hear lots...Hear...stories... Can tell...if...
1�Would you like to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�Which story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Provenance(pt.1).Provenance(pt.2).Provenance(pt.3).Provenance(pt.4).Crystal Guardian(pt.1).Crystal Guardian(pt.2).Crystal Guardian(pt.3).Endings and Beginnings.
1�What shall you ask?There are...ten of you?Have you shrunk?Where in Vana'diel am I?I need ask nothing.
1�?[He/She] made it through without being ground to kibble! Avoided a ghastly death!
1�Could ?[he/she] be??[He/She] must be!  !
1�I suppose.?[He/She] does seem awfully perplexed. Mightily muddled.
1�Keep in mind I know not all--only what I know.Now, where shall we begin?
1�An astute observation, indeed. Sagacity manifest.
1�While we now number in the double digits, originally we were one. A single soul.
1�Were we complete, you question? Whole, you ask?
1�You speak not only with passion, but reason as well. Prudence and force.
1�...<Cough>We ran the gamut of emotions from grief to joy. Played all the parts.We laughed, we cried, we witnessed our brethren die.
1�In summation, it was a trying time for us. The pinnacle of drama.
1�Did my explanation not shed enough light on the matter? Paint a full picture?
1�Oh well, it matters not. There is no need to lick each strand of fur into place. Obsess over particulars.We have more important issues to address.
1�Silence! May a cait take your tongue!
1�...<Ahem> Moving on.
1�I trust that magniloquent moogle favored you with facts on the details of our disappearance?Well, that journey is the reason behind our sudden split. Sweet emancipation.
1�If three is company, ten is trauma.At any rate, we should never even have been able to assume our current form. Shocking revelation.
1�Once we coalesced at the spiritual level, it should have been impossible to separate us. Together forever.
1�Yet here we are, in the fur...our original bodies reclaimed.Even those of us who perished have been revived. A fairy-tale ending?

1�So it seems.Why we assumed a diminutive stature--and why we still know most nothing about the Voidwalkers--remains a mystery to us.Perhaps a greater entity diverted some of our life force for its own benefit. Baseless conjecture.
1�Disbelief clouds your gaze. You assume we no longer possess the power to assist you.I assure you that we remain as we always have, however. Our powers fully intact.Why do you snicker so,  ?
1�To wit, the shock of separation left us unable to perform even the simplest tasks. Weak as kittens.Hence our delay in contacting Kupofried.
1�Yet, since arriving here, we now exert ten thousand jigocaits of energy...or only a fraction of what a veteran adventurer can muster. A deceptive number.
1�My point is that one cannot judge a kitten by its whiskers.A cait by any other form would still smell as fishy. Warrant investigation.
1�A question for the ages, that.This is where all life ultimately trickles back toward. Dilutes within the transient river of time.
1�...Vana'diel's provenance.
1�As an adventurer, you must surely remember one of the most canonic verses ever uttered. Hallowed words.??It all began with a stone...??
1�And whence did that stone cast its first rays of purifying light? Banish the darkness?
1�In Navukgo Execution Chamber.6No, of course it was here. The origin.

1�Life shines forth from this crystalline domain in a prismatic display of brilliance, only to return as a dim reflection.And so the cycle repeats, light dispersing darkness and darkness consuming light. Perpetual flux.
1�While this is both the birthplace and resting place for life, most living beings are unable to lay eyes upon these lands. It remains recondite.
1�We caits, however, are born of Altana.Her spirit resides in us all, and connects us to all the world's locales. Sets us apart.
1�Yet we were most likely led here by the souls of our fallen brethren.
1�How else could we have stumbled upon this place?Their ethereal cries must have traversed dimensions to resonate in our hearts and bid us unite. Beckon us.
1�This whole phenomenon is nothing short of a miracle.
1�So they say...Now, let us return to the matter at hand.
1�According to the ancient verse, these crystals should no longer emit any light. Illuminate the realm no more.However, we are not shrouded in complete darkness.
1�While only vestiges of light may remain in this bleak and lifeless shell, it continues to bestow Vana'diel with life. Make it prosper.
1�...You look as if I just gave a twenty-hour lecture on gauging the ripeness of pamamas. Intricate drivel.If something this elementary causes you to lose your wits, then--
1�Oho, I almost released the proverbial cait from its bag.I certainly wouldn't want to overburden your mind with unnecessary details. Vex with minutiae.
1�Indubitably.
1�Something knows we are here, and it is none too pleased by our presence. Wants us gone.

1�I see doubt has cast its shadow upon your countenance, but not even the most capable of adventurers possess our finely tuned sense of danger. Our ability to smell trouble.Rest assured, this threat is no fabrication.
1�Moreover, the timing and location of these disturbances is quite coincidental. A fortuitous occurrence.They could very well be related to Vana'diel's interdimensional invaders.

1�That crystal!The source--or should we say sources--would seem to emanate from beyond that crystal.What seemed an isolated phenomenon at first exposure has become the collective ire of a bloodthirsty horde. A maddening fury.

1�You have truly been blessed by the Goddess if you evaded this terrorizing and oppressive force.As much as we yearn to play a role in your heroic production, we can barely hold ourselves upright. Cannot take the stage.
1�Even if we could, however, there is little guarantee we would prove useful.Our separation made us no weaker, but neither did it make us strong. A double-edged sword.
1�Though we cannot assist you on the battlefield, we can provision you with this. A trick of the trade.
1�This lustrous insect is called 6????.We raise these ourselves on a diet of sheer will and determination. Noble virtues.
1�With this 3????, we will be granted insight wherever you may go and whatever you may do on your journey. Convenience incarnate.
1�...Hm? No, that is the only task it performs.What more could one expect from a mere bug? A lowly insect?
1�Mreowr?Whoa, whoa, whoa. Leave not so soon.May I see that stone of yours?
1�Yes, that crystal with the ghostly white glow. Cadaverous pallor.
1�Nothing remotely similar has ever crossed my eyes.This crystal appears to harbor some uncanny power from a bygone era. Primitive puissance.
1�So this is plunder gained from a Voidwalker battle? Interdimensional fisticuffs?
1�The way it resonates with these surroundings...This is no normal hunk of rock. No common tabby cait.
1�I suppose returning it to you would do no harm.Whatever you do, you must not relinquish it. Let it slip through your paws.
1�Something this peculiar must surely have a use--we need only find out what that is.In the meantime, maybe it will serve as a lucky charm in your travels. Invite felicity.
1�Mreowr?Whoa, whoa, whoa. Leave not so soon.May I see that stone of yours?
1�Yes, that crystal with the ghostly white glow. Cadaverous pallor.
1�Nothing remotely similar has ever crossed my eyes.This crystal appears to harbor some uncanny power from a bygone era. Primitive puissance.
1�So this is plunder gained from a Voidwalker battle? Interdimensional fisticuffs?
1�The way it resonates with these surroundings...This is no normal hunk of rock. No common tabby cait.
1�I suppose returning it to you would do no harm.Whatever you do, you must not relinquish it. Let it slip through your paws.
1�Something this peculiar must surely have a use--we need only find out what that is.In the meantime, maybe it will serve as a lucky charm in your travels. Invite felicity.
1�I see you have another of those peculiar crystals for me. Enigmatic gift.
1�At first glance, this one appears identical to the last.Upon closer inspection, however, its luster is of a slightly different variety. Upended expectations.
1�Then we have a consensus. Unanimous agreement.
1� , we cannot guarantee that any more of these crystals exist. Make no promises.If you do stumble upon some, however, we ask that you bring them here to us.
1�With more of these in our paws, there exists a not-negligible chance that potential possibilities might probably unfold. Presumably.
1�Even if you do not believe in the power of the crystals,  , believe in us who believe in them!Now put yourself in harm's way so we can study those crystals! Selfish motivation!
1�It appears as though our shot in the dark has paid off with flying colors. A smashing success.
1�But now is not the time for giddiness. Enthusiasm must be tempered.

1�I remember hearing that the fabled stone which rid Vana'diel of its darkness long ago had, in the days of the gods, a guardian. A deific deterrent.I would not have believed it still stalked this, its former demesne, until today.

1�Although vanquishing this primeval protector was undeniably a heroic deed, I fear the dragon will not go so quietly into the night.You may have set it to slumber for now, but as something seems to have angered this drused sentinel, it will likely stir again soon. Reawaken with a vengeance.
1�I realize this thought is rather discouraging. Destroys the mood.However, such is the reality of this surreal situation.
1�Yet this guardian's absence does not correspond to Provenance's destruction.That much we gathered from using 6????. Beneficial bug.
1�Were time and space to collapse around us...perish the thought. Forget it even crossed my mind.
1�As I hope you recall, this is the origin of all Vana'diel.Should this place cease to exist, it would be the end of the whole realm as we know it. None too pleasing.
1�Oh, the chills that petrify my spine... Freeze me in fear.
1�Sorry, but if we continue on this morbid topic, I will be reduced to a shivering mass of frazzled fur. A scaredy cait.
1�I see no apocalypses on the immediate horizon. All clear.It may be best to leave hypotheticals for another day.
1�I believe the old adage is ??Let sleeping caits lie.??
1�I need to stop being a prisoner of my own imagination. A cellmate to insanity.Moving on...
1�What do you plan to do about the crystal sentry, that mineral marauder?

1�It may be impossible to completely quell the fires of its rage, but we can at least snuff them into somnolence. From flame to flicker.Each occasion this foul-tempered fiend is put to bed should buy the realm time to recover...even if those halcyon days will be fleeting.
1�On second thought...

1�Let us assume the dragon can be slain. Cleaved and shattered.Because Provenance is intricately intertwined with the rest of Vana'diel, a deft change here could positively realign the fabric of the realm!
1�Oh, how interdimensional travel has addled my mind. Dispatched my sanity.No one has ever witnessed something of that magnitude...and probably never will. There is no reason to entertain such--
1�Ah, how I loathe the sound of serpents. It rings of...futility.
1�Let us depart,  .I see no need to go charging back into battle so soon. Once bitten, twice shy.
1�There is one last scrap of information I must report before you journey off into the sunset. Disappear from our sight.
1�We must remain behind. Cannot accompany you.
1�Why?Did we not discuss the reason earlier? Explain it at length?This dragon will not slither away on its own. For that, we need you.
1�Kupofried knows of our intentions as well. Well informed.He should prove helpful...if not a little loquacious.
1�At any rate, the depth of your altruism knows no bounds. Breaks all limits.This is the least we can do to repay you.
1�Ultimately, the decision to return or not is yours.Especially because we have already entrusted the fate of the realm to you once. Made you do our bidding.
1�...Oh my. Do not misunderstand.You are more to us than a simple dupe. No mere cait's-paw.Please forget you ever heard that remark.
1�Phew.
1�This is where it all began...Where all light, all life, first shines...
1�Perhaps one day you--the one from our plane of existence--will spread ?[his/her] wings here alongside that lass. Your partner in flight.
1�Of course you will. Myriad realities emanate from this single location, and to it they all return. Reflected back.

1�It is likely you two could convene even before death. As with the realm itself, Vana'diel's inhabitants lead as many possible lives as there are sunrises.One pair could be on their way even as we speak. Engage in idle chit-chat.

1�Surely you have experienced life on one of these variant planes of existence before. If not, you most certainly will.Then again, should you be putting your trust in a cunning feline such as myself?

1�However, you can trust the world to change. Paths to diverge.Provenance may be both the beginning and the end of life in Vana'diel, but the possibilities that lie in between are endless. Be true to yourself and you can grab the world by the scruff of its neck, never again needing to worry about which path you tread.
1�Presence or absence of memory is not the issue at hand. The point in question.Rather, we must devote our full attention to normalizing this interdimensional aberration.
1�My sentiments exactly.Even if the cait dragged ?[his/her] forgetful hide in from somewhen else, we all want the realm back to normal. Great minds think alike.
1�Hardly.Such expressions are of no more use than a cait's idle mewings. Naught but noise.
1�The forgotten shards of shattered crystals may be all the eye can see, but be not deceived. Pay close attention.The whole world is out to exact revenge upon us!
1�Dha is suggesting that these crystals could guide us to whatever lurks amidst these shadows. A beacon of light in the darkness.

1�Much like we were guided here by the souls of our lost brethren, this artifact should guide you through the deepest, darkest crag here. The most abysmal depths.Though no records exist to confirm how deep it truly is...
1�That sounds a little bombastic for me. Overdramatic.Still, I can definitely feel something pulsating over this desolate landscape.
1�There are more where those came from, correct?Then, it is possible that they could be...!
1�G-g-good morning?No, ??Good afternoon??...?
1�Nyahahaha!Our Champion of the Dawn seems more like the Champion of the Doze today. Sleeping on the job.
1�Do you recall our visages? Recognize our faces?
1�Nyahahaha!Looks like you went astray with your description there, Naoi! Flopped and floundered!
1�Nyahahaha!Like the Goddess herself will just descend from the clouds and lead us to some final battle with an evil mastermind. Deus ex nebula.
1�Huh. Maybe I was wrong.
1�Just take care not to have your own light snuffed out, Champion of the Dawn.
1�You have arisen from unconsciousness, I see. Awake at last!
1�Never a truer word has been spoken, Aon!I had already passed on at the time! Scratched my last post!How could anyone call that ??complete??!?
1�Bravo! Well said!
1�Is it just me, or has the air become thick with ominous portent of late? Fantastical foreshadowing.
1�I concur!Also, our Champion of the Dawn says there are only a few places to search. Easy pickings.We should at least give it a try!
1�This is exactly the reaction we desired!
1�The callousness of it all...I'm thrown into paroxysms of sorrow. Bouts of bleakness.How could anyone be so cruel!?
1�Caits have nine lives!
1�Could there truly be some primeval entity stalking the plains of this wasteland? A predator searching for prey?
1�No more caesuras! Cough it up!
1�They seem to be resonating...
1�Separation could very well have meant death for us, and we were ready to accept our fate. A plea and a paw.
1�I doubt ?[he/she] does.Like Naoi said, ?[he/she] comes from another point in time. A different breed of cait.I would be more surprised if ?[he/she] did.
1�Our minds may indeed be great, Dha, but Aon is only stating the obvious.Without this champion's help, we cannot even begin to wish for success. Achievement eludes us.
1�Naoi, you hold the firmest grasp on our predicament.Would you care to enlighten this adventurer as well? Apprise this person?

1�I have also noticed a certain anger pervading the land. Blood boiling over.This place seems to possess eyes of its own, their ferocious glare able to peel back every layer of resolve like a sharp claw through hare hide. My fur stands on end just contemplating it.
1�Still, this world seems to imbue them with some ethereal power.How can we understand this phenomenon unless we collect more crystals for observation? Gather and learn.
1�This crystal apparently responds to whatever holds us caits in check. Keeps us at bay.That force should act as a beacon for the stone and guide you to your destination.
1�May you be blessed with the light of Altana. Doused in her protective glow.
1�Obtain this item?
1�Obtain the #?????Yes.No.
1�Relinquish all reward items?Yes, relinquish.On second thought...
1�All reward items have been relinquishe

1�The threads of space and time warp and bend before your eyes...
1�Travel to the Walk of Echoes?Yes, venture forth.No, remain behind.
1�{You have not claimed all of your battle reward
1�Relinquish your claim to the battle spoils?Yes.On second thought...
1�Items will be lost. Are you certain?Yes, relinquish.No, retain.
1�Skip the event?Yes.No.
